settings.freeship_text: FREE Standard Shipping  on orders $50 and above.

settings.title: Holiday Shipping Guide (within Continental US)
settings.desc_cont:
For over 50 years, Agraria has been helping families create holiday memories thru the power of fragrance. Celebrating holiday traditions is more important than ever and planning early will help your gifts arrive safely and on time. The postal service and shipping companies are experiencing increased volume and unanticipated delays, so we encourage you to place your orders early. Our elves are standing by ready to pick, pack and wrap your holiday gifts.

To help promote delivery by December 24th, order no later than 12pm PST on the dates listed below. Dates are suggested to avoid potential delays, however, actual delivery time varies according by shipment carrier and distance from Agraria fulfillment center in California. See map above for general estimate on shipping time.

settings.title: Mother's Day Shipping Guide (within Continental US)
settings.desc_cont: To help promote delivery by May 13th, order no later than 12pm PDT on the dates listed below. Dates are suggested to avoid potential delays, however, actual delivery time varies according by shipment carrier and distance from Agraria fulfillment center in California. See map above for general estimate on shipping time.

settings.title: Shipping within Continental US
settings.content1:
$6 Flat Rate Shipping. FREE Standard Shipping on orders $50 and above.

Your order should arrive in 3-7 business days from the date the order was shipped.
settings.content2:
Price based on shipping address

Your order should arrive in 2-5 business days from the date the order was shipped.
settings.content3:
Price based on shipping address

Your order should arrive in 3 business days from the date the order was shipped.
settings.content4:
Price based on shipping address

Your order should arrive in 2 business days from the date the order was shipped.
settings.content5:
Price based on shipping address

Your order should arrive in 1 business day from the date the order was shipped.

settings.title: Shipping to US outer regions (Alaska, Hawaii, US Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico) and Canada
settings.content1:
Price based on shipping address

Your order should arrive in 3-7 business days from the date the order was shipped.
settings.content2:
Price based on shipping address

Your order should arrive in 4 business days from the date the order was shipped.
settings.content3: Not available for the US outer regions
settings.content4: Customer will be required to pay customs and duty prior to delivery. Due to the international nature of the order, delays are common. Shipping times and processing fees are subject to change and will be determined at time of order subject to the shipping options outlined above. Agraria cannot be held responsible for late/failed deliveries for reasons outside of our control i.e. in the cases of adverse weather conditions.

settings.page_description:
All orders will be processed and shipped within the 2 business days from the time your order is submitted, unless Express or Priority shipping is selected when the goods will be shipped the same day, providing the order is completed before 12 noon (PDT) Monday to Friday. Dispatch is subject to payment card authorization and stock availability. Please note, we do not dispatch shipments or deliver on weekends or public holidays.

Estimated shipping time required (in addition to processing time) from fulfillment location in California.

settings.heading: It all began in a little shop on Nob Hill
settings.content: As interior designers, Agraria founders Stanford Stevenson and Maurice Gibson envisioned fragrant products as essential design elements for their clients' San Francisco homes. They felt certain that "No great home is ever completely decorated until it has its most important accessory – home fragrance."

In addition to the Chinese bowls they filled with Bitter Orange potpourri, they created their first fragrant candle called Balsam, which mingled beautifully with the potpourri. We still make the original Bitter Orange and Lavender & Rosemary potpourris the same way – one box at a time.

We are honored that our Lemon Verbena guest amenities are featured in 170 InterContinental® Hotels & Resorts properties around the world. We have a shared heritage dating back to the 1970s, when we opened our Taylor Street boutique on Nob Hill, just down the hill from the InterContinental® Mark Hopkins San Francisco.

settings.heading: ABOUT AGRARIA
settings.sub-heading: We sparkle, we shine and we're as beautiful as we are fragrant
settings.content: Agraria means "beautiful flowers growing in the fields," and is the brand name our founders, Stanford Stevenson and Maurice Gibson, chose for their hand-made potpourri. First tossed in the back room of their San Francisco shop on Taylor Street, it was full of flowers, herbs, spices and its mysterious new fragrance became known as Bitter Orange. It’s unique, spicy fragrance has been described by The New York Times as “uplifting, mysterious and androgynous in its appeal.”

Today our AirEssence and PetiteEssence Diffusers, liquid versions of potpourri, "grow" into beautiful fragrant flowers as they absorb perfume-grade oils. Each flower is hand-made one petal at a time from paper-thin slices of sola plants grown in the fields of Southeast Asia.

Formulated to "mix and mingle marvelously", our eight fragrances smell as beautiful as they look. Exquisite packaging and custom-designed fragrance patterns establish us as the ultimate for those who wish to live and gift luxuriously. You can find Agraria in hundreds of high-end decorative accessories shops and prestige department stores around the world.

settings.heading: Agraria's loyal fan base helped lead America's luxury aromatherapy movement.
settings.review_text1: I thought Fifty-Seventh Street was Heaven. I smelled the Agraria potpourri wafting out of Henri Bendel, but I just thought the street smelled good."
settings.review_text2: Opulent, playful, chic—these scented tassels add not only glamour to any doorknob but a lush fragrance to any room.
settings.details2: The O List, Oprah Magazine, March 2009
settings.review_text3: "When you travel, you always feel like you're missing everything...I buy Agraria Bitter Orange Burning Sticks. I think the incense smell creates some kind of dependence. It reminds me of the Catholic church".
settings.details3: Giorgio Armani, New York Magazine, November 2004
settings.review_text4: "Thank you Agraria, for making my life smell so sweet".

settings.page_description:
The Agraria name and packaging makes the proper impression when presented to colleagues and clients for any celebration any time of the year. Whether it be for ongoing gifting programs or a special event or seasonal holiday, we will work with you to customize a selection from our collection of over 100 products with price points from $20 to $275. Our fragrances are unisex and range from home products the entire family (or office) can enjoy, to more personal bath & body collections that say “you’re special and deserve the very best.”

Each gift is creatively wrapped in gold organza and tied with a tasseled cord. Gift cards can be customized for each gift and sent either separately or delivered to one location for you to present.

Contact us at info@agrariahome.com for more information.

settings.page_description:
Now more than ever, travelers are seeking accommodations that offer recognized luxury retail brands as part of their travel experience. Create an elevated experience for your guests with our aromatherapy-inspired products. Agraria amenities can be found in 63,000+ rooms, across 184 top-tier boutique hotels and resorts in 64 countries worldwide.

Contact us for more information on how to provide your guests with this exceptional experience.

settings.page_description:
Founded in San Francisco in 1970, with exposure in 64 countries across the globe, Agraria is the leader in the premium Home Fragrance and Bath & Body categories with an affluent global consumer base.

Our products can be found in 400+ top-tier retail department and fine gift stores worldwide, offering 150 SKUs across 9 fragrances and 8 product categories.

Please submit the following questionnaire so we may contact you with additional information.

settings.title: Online Purchase Returns
settings.content:
We hope you are delighted with your purchase. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied, we are happy to offer a refund, exchange or replacement on all goods purchased on agrariahome.com within 10 days of your receipt of items. Please note: Only products purchased on agrariahome.com may be returned for refund or exchange at this time.

Please contact our Customer Service team at 800-824-3632 (M-F 9am-5p PST) or via email at info@agrariahome.com within 10 days informing us of the product(s) you wish to return or exchange. We will provide you with details on how to proceed with a return, exchange or replacement.

settings.title: Damaged/Faulty Items
settings.content:
All of our products are thoroughly inspected before they are shipped to ensure you receive the best possible product. When your order arrives, please inspect the carton for any damage that may have occurred during shipment. It is normal for the shipping carton to show some wear, however, if damage occurred to the item(s) in your shipment, please contact us immediately. If for any reason the items you receive are faulty in any way, we will be happy to exchange the items or offer a full refund.

Please contact our Customer Service team at 800-824-3632 (M-F 9am-5p PST) or via email at info@agrariahome.com within 10 days of receiving the product. Please have your order number along with your email address and phone number ready for fastest service. To ensure prompt resolution, please retain the shipping box, packing materials and the damaged items for inspection by the carrier. The damaged product will be replaced with the same item as soon as possible. An alternative product will be offered in cases where stocks are no longer available.

settings.page_description:
Agraria products do not contain any animal ingredients or animal-derived ingredients and are not tested on animals.

All of our fragrances are formulated with 100% natural and essential perfume-grade oils.

Our bath and body collections contain no parabens, sulfates or phthalates

settings.text: Agraria was founded in 1970 by San Francisco interior designers, Stanford Stevenson and Maurice Gibson who envisioned fragrant products as essential and complementary design elements for their clients' San Francisco homes. They believed that like the choice of a Biedermeier table, an Eames chair or a Viking Professional range, the way in which a home smells speaks to the overall aesthetics of its inhabitants. Whether a mansion or an apartment, a “home” is not complete without the punctuation of a signature scent.

With that in mind, Stevenson and Gibson created Agraria, which means “beautiful flowers growing in the fields.” Their debut product was their classic handmade potpourri, first tossed in the back room of their intimate San Francisco shop on Taylor Street. Full of flowers, herbs and spices, this layered, mysterious, fragrance became known as Bitter Orange. To this day it remains Agraria’s signature scent and is as modern and provocative today as it was 50 years ago.

From its inception, Agraria’s home products were created for the discerning. Classic yet current, all-natural, vegan, and qualitative in every aspect, Agraria was and
is way ahead of it time in creating luxe home products that are environmentally correct. While one can get lost in nostalgia and tradition, it is the current relevance of Agraria’s products and their applications that make them so timeless.

A scent can transport us. It triggers memories, transcends history, and can alternately comfort and excite.  It is both inspirational and aspirational.  A singular scent functions as a muse that drives poetry and acts as a salve in our everyday lives. We cling to smells, both remembered and imagined, as we do to a perfectly worn pair of jeans, a favorite recipe, or a declaration of love.

In our current world, we look to find ways to escape the stress of everyday life. Our home is an oasis of calm in the storm and we do what we can to create a beautiful environment that wholly envelopes us. Aromatherapy is no longer an indulgence but a necessary outlet to create a serene and stable environment. Today more than ever, we need to believe in the sanctity and tranquility of our home.

When we choose a scent for our person or our home, we do not take this decision lightly. It defines us. The perfect scent is an invitation to know us. It is a window into our sensual souls and must be chosen carefully, as we would a gemstone, a bottle of wine, or a statement piece of art.

To that end, every Agraria product is a precious jewel. And, like our favorite jewelry, there is an appropriate time and place for each piece. Sometimes we mix and match and other times we opt for a singular statement. Each one of Agraria’s eight fragrances stands alone as a perfectly crafted, multi-dimensional scent, but also play well together to create a sensory symphony when working together.

Whether an air diffuser, a candle, a box of potpourri, or an incense stick, each Agraria item is custom-designed and exquisitely packaged for the ultimate in luxurious gift giving and self-care. Today our AirEssence and PetiteEssence Diffusers, liquid versions of potpourri, "grow" into beautiful fragrant flowers as they absorb perfume-grade oils. Each flower is hand-made one petal at a time from paper-thin slices of sola plants grown in the fields of Southeast Asia.

Agraria is proud to introduce A+, their new line of botanically-derived hair and skincare products formulated in harmony with nature and science. The A+ body care line marks the brands expansion into the wellness category with all products made with a dedication to natural ingredients that are known to be among nature’s best for healthier hair and skin. In creating A+, Agraria used high-quality, therapeutic botanicals such as Gingko Biloba, Comfrey, Kelp, Yarrow and Arnica and the super power of Hemp, plus organic Argan, Baobab and Sunflower Seed Oils to create a line of products that are pure and beneficial for the body. You can find Agraria in hundreds of high-end decorative accessories shops and prestige department stores around the world. These world-class retail outlets understand and appreciate that Agraria is the ultimate in at-home scent and body products and worthy of their discriminating customers.

Whether choosing a special host gift, creating the ideal scent profile for your own home, or treating yourself to the ultimate hair and skin products, Agraria has the perfect option for you. From fresh and playful to exotic and sensual, our fragrances unfold like a flower or a beautifully crafted short story. They are three-dimensional with a beginning, middle, and end - never cloying and never artificial. 

 Agraria presents exquisitely designed home scent and body products that are simply a cut above all others. Once you have experienced their visual beauty, depth of fragrance, and way in which they enhance the overall quality of home living, there is simply no going back to lesser products.

settings.subtitle1: Said to have originated from Damascus, they were also used by Romans to extract purple dye from the skins
settings.subtitle2: Indigenous to Vietnam and Southern China, the bold spice we're familiar with is the dried fruit of an evergreen

settings.subtitle2: Dating back at least 4000 years, Cardamom was prized for its medicinal qualities well before its culinary use
settings.subtitle3: Also known as "Black gold," the oil from Agarwood is one of the world's most expensive perfume ingredients

settings.text:
Earn more Reward Points for different actions, and turn those Reward Points into awesome rewards!

How points work:- 100 points = $1- For every $1 a customer spends online, they will receive 5 reward points (effectively, 5% back for every purchase)- If they share AGRARIA on FB or Instagram, they get 250 reward points- If they sign up for an account, they get 500 reward points- If a customer refers a friend and the friend makes an order, both the referring and referred customer get $10 off coupon
